sentences.sContent: "Please don't yell at me." She began to sniffle.
sentences.sCn: “请不要对我大嚷大叫。”她开始啜泣起来。

trans.tranOther: If you sniffle, you keep sniffing, usually because you are crying or have a cold

trans.tranCn: 鼻塞声；不断的吸鼻子（等于snuffle）
trans.tranOther: if you have the sniffles, you keep sniffing, especially because you have a cold
